comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: This is one of a number of churches in Limerick known as the "Sinking Church"  In this case it got the appellation as the actual site was much deeper than the street level you see here, the gate to the left of the picture led down to a space where there was a number of tennis courts and recreation areas for the congregation.  It was very solidly built and so was definitely not sinking!
